wide; broad; lenient
широкий; широкий; снисходительный
rtega_mnemonic:

宽宽		寛broad, wide, lenient, tolerant
  • house 宀 broad and tolerant enough to house horns, eye and tail (a gazelle) 萈
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 宽)
Antonyms: 窄
Pictophonetic: 苋 indicates the sound; 宀 (roof) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
寬闊 [ kuān kuò ]: expansive; wide; width; thickness
寬鬆 [ kuān sōng ]: to relax (policy); relaxed
寬容 [ kuān róng ]: lenient; tolerant; indulgent; charitable; to forgive

heisig_chinese_memo: Hippie parents keep a wide open and tolerant mind when they see their son's special green flowers in the house.

kuān: (прил/глаг) мягкий, снисходительный; быть снисходительным; расслабляться, чувствовать облегчение
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Hippie parents keep a wide open and tolerant mind when they see their son's special green flowers in the house.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscriptions from "宀", "萈" sound, the original meaning of the house is wide, and the extension is wide, loose, and gentle. "Shuowen": "Wide, the room is wide. From the 宀, the sound of the sound." Duan Yucai's note: ""Guangyun" said: "Yu Ye. Slow Ye." Its extended meaning." "Shuo Wen": "萈, goat with thin horns. From rabbit feet, 𥄕 sound. All the genus of 萈 is from 萈. Read Ruomaru. From then on the word wide."

Jin Wen expresses lenient, Shi Migui: "I dominate the Kuanya", " Ya " refers to the land within Wangji, which means to strengthen the defense of the border, and the guard of the land under the royal capital can be more relaxed, that is, internal relaxation. Wai Zhang (Zhang Maorong).
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from "宀", "萈" sound, the original meaning of the house is spacious, and the extension is broad, loose, and gentle.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「宀」，「萈」聲，本義是房屋寬大，引伸為寬闊、寬鬆、寬緩。《說文》：「寬，屋寬大也。从宀，萈聲。」段玉裁注：「《廣韻》曰：『裕也。緩也。』其引伸之義也。」《說文》：「萈，山羊細角者。从兔足，𥄕聲。凡萈之屬皆从萈。讀若丸。寬字从此。」

　　金文表示寬緩，史密簋：「乃執鄙寬亞」，「亞」指王畿內之地，意謂加強邊境的防守，而王都轄下土地的守衛可較為寬鬆，即內弛外張(張懋鎔)。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「宀」，「萈」聲，本義是房屋寬大，引伸為寬闊、寬鬆、寬緩。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
寬 (Simplified: 宽)
Pinyin: kuān
English Definition: wide; broad; lenient
Antonyms: 窄
Total strokes: 15; Radical: 宀
Pictophonetic: 苋 indicates the sound; 宀 (roof) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 宀 [gàimian2] roof; house
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • ⿻ Overlaid
      • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
      • 丶 [ diǎn ] dot
Example Words:
寬闊 [ kuān kuò ]: expansive; wide; width; thickness
寬鬆 [ kuān sōng ]: to relax (policy); relaxed
寬容 [ kuān róng ]: lenient; tolerant; indulgent; charitable; to forgive
More: 寬* | *寬 | *寬*

Original meaning 本义: Meaning spacious.

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 寬 from building 宀 mián and related phonetic goat-huan 萈 huán and (not 莧 xiàn) and (not- 艹 cao) and (substitute 苋莧萈 xiàn) simp 宽. (name- wide-kuan 宽寬 kuān)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- a stockade for a goat - a lot of space) (- the goat looses its tail during simplification)

HSK 5: 寬,宽
寬寬RS
宽宽 		寛 broad, wide, lenient, tolerant
  • house 宀 broad and tolerant enough to house horns, eye and tail (a gazelle) 萈
(Simplified: 宽)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 窄
Pictophonetic: 苋 indicates the sound; 宀 (roof) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿳ Above to middle and below
    • 宀 [gàimian2] roof; house
    • 艹 [ cǎo ] grass, weed, plant, herb
    • ⿻ Overlaid
      • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
      • 丶 [ diǎn ] dot
①橫的距離大，範圍廣，與“窄”相對：寬廣。寬闊。寬綽。寬敞。寬度。寬曠。寬窄。
②使鬆緩：寬心。寬衣。寬解。寬慰。
③不嚴厲，不苛求：寬待。寬宏。寬厚。寬鬆。寬容。寬恕。寬仁。寬赦。
④富裕：寬裕。
⑤姓氏。
寬闊 [ kuān kuò ]: expansive; wide; width; thickness
寬鬆 [ kuān sōng ]: to relax (policy); relaxed
寬容 [ kuān róng ]: lenient; tolerant; indulgent; charitable; to forgive
(Simplified: 宽)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 窄

Chinese: Hippie parents keep a wide open and tolerant mind when they see their son's special green flowers in the house.
Meaning: wide
Hanzi: 宽
Story: Hippie parents keep a wide open and tolerant mind when they see their son's special green flowers in the house.
Kind: traditional

金文從「 宀 」，「 萈 」聲，本義是房屋寬大，引伸為寬闊、寬鬆、寬緩。《說文》：「寬，屋寬大也。从宀，萈聲。」段玉裁注：「《廣韻》曰：『裕也。緩也。』其引伸之義也。」《說文》：「萈，山羊細角者。从兔足，𥄕聲。凡萈之屬皆从萈。讀若丸。寬字从此。」 金文表示寬緩，史密簋：「乃執鄙寬亞」，「 亞 」指王畿內之地，意謂加強邊境的防守，而王都轄下土地的守衛可較為寬鬆，即內弛外張(張懋鎔)。
Elaboration: The inscriptions from " 宀", " 萈" sound, the original meaning of the house is wide, and the extension is wide, loose, and gentle. "Shuowen": "Wide, the room is wide. From the 宀, the sound of the sound." Duan Yucai's note: ""Guangyun" said: "Yu Ye. Slow Ye." Its extended meaning." "Shuo Wen": "萈, goat with thin horns. From rabbit feet, 𥄕 sound. All the genus of 萈 is from 萈. Read Ruomaru. From then on the word wide." Jin Wen expresses lenient, Shi Migui: "I dominate the Kuanya", " Ya" refers to the land within Wangji, which means to strengthen the defense of the border, and the guard of the land under the royal capital can be more relaxed, that is, internal relaxation. Wai Zhang (Zhang Maorong).

寬字的基本解释

寬
kuān
见“宽”。

寬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuān］
［《廣韻》苦官切，平桓，溪。］
亦作“寛1”。“宽1”的繁体字。“完2”的今字。
(1)宽阔，广阔。
(2)度量宽宏；宽厚。
(3)宽免；宽恕。
(4)不严；宽大对待。
(5)舒缓；延缓。
(6)宽松；松弛。
(7)减轻。
(8)宽慰；宽解。
(9)卸脱；解开。
(10)多；宽裕。
(11)宽度。
(12)广泛。
(13)姓。汉有宽舒。见《汉书》本传。

寬字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页292第06
〔古文〕完【唐韻】苦官切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】枯官切，?㱁平聲。【說文】屋寬大也。从宀莧聲。莧音桓，今文省作寬。一曰緩也。【廣韻】愛也，裕也。又舒也。【易·乾卦】寬以居之。【詩·衞風】寬兮綽兮。【註】寬，宏裕也。又【書·舜典】敬敷五敎在寬。　又【增韻】不猛也。【書·大禹謨】臨下以?，御衆以寬。又【君?】寬而有制，從容以和。【左傳·昭二十年】子產謂子大叔曰：唯有德者能以寬服民，其次莫如猛。又曰寬以濟猛，猛以濟寬，政是以和。　又緩也。【史記·韓非列傳】寬則寵名譽之，人急則用介冑之士。　又宥也。【史記·廉頗列傳】鄙賤之人，不圖將軍寬之至此也。　又姓。　又叶驅圓切，音圈。【詩·衛風】考槃在㵎，碩人之寬。叶下諼。　又叶巨員切，音權。【韓愈·閔已賦】昔顏氏之庶幾，在隱約而平寬。固哲人之細事，夫子乃嗟歎其賢。

寬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
寬字的起名意思

暂无。

width
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuān］
["Guangyun" bitter official cut, Pinghuan, Xi. ]
Also known as "寛1". Traditional characters of "Width 1". The present character of "End 2".
(1) Broad and expansive.
(2) The measure is magnanimous; magnanimous.
(3) Forgiveness; Forgiveness.
(4) Lax; lenient treatment.
(5) Relieve; delay.
(6) Loose; loose.
(7) Mitigation.
(8) Relief; relief.
(9) Take off; untie.
(10) Many; generous.
(11) Width.
(12) Extensive.
(13) Last name. Han has Kuan Shu. See the biography of "Han Shu".
width

【Yin Ji 1】【Luo Zi Department】　kuan; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 292 06
[Ancient text] End [Tang Yun] bitter official cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] dry official cut,? 㱁 flat sound. [Said the text] The house is spacious. From the sound of Luo Ling. Ling Yinhuan, this article will be generous. One said slowly. [Guang Yun] Ai Ye, Yu Ye. Shu Ye again. [Easy·Qian Gua] To live in a wide range. [Poetry·Weifeng] Broad and generous. [Note] Kuan, Hongyu also. Also 【Book·Shun Code】respect and apply the five euphemisms in wideness.　[Zeng Yun] It’s not fierce. 【Book·Da Yumo】Let's come down and let the public be wide. Also 【Jun?】Broad and controlled, calmly and peacefully. [Zuo Chuan·20th Year of Zhao] Uncle Zi Chan said: Only those who are virtuous can persuade the people with lenientity, and the second is fierce. It is also said that width is to aid fierceness, fierce to aid width, and politics is to be peaceful.　Slowly again. 【Historical Records·Han Fei Biography】Wideness will favor fame, and people who are urgent will use the scholars.　YoYe again. 【Historical Records · Biography of Lian Po】Despite people, don't want the general to be too generous.　Another last name.　Ye drives round cut again, voice coil. 【Poetry·Weifeng】Testing Pan Zai 㵎, a man of breadth. Leaves under the ferociousness.　Ye Juyuan cut again, Yinquan. [Han Yu·Min Yifu] The Xiyan family's concubine is faint and flat. The master sighs at the details of the solid philosophers.
